input_text:
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend (US-Remote)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Mission: MDpanel is one of the largest providers of expert medical opinions in the United States. We are committed to being the most coveted partner for physicians, carriers, attorneys, and patients by connecting those in need of medical opinions with the most qualified and highly-regarded medical professionals in the U.S. And, at the heart of MDpanel, is our team committed to delivering an unparalleled experience for all stakeholders. We think big, start small, and move fast. Our culture is built on supporting each other with accountability, transparency, and passion for our mission.  Position Summary: As a Senior Software Engineer - Backend, you will play a pivotal role in building the APIs and services that power MDpanel's products. You will work on a small and talented team of engineers to deliver web and mobile apps that help doctors do their job more efficiently and effectively. Your services will power our GraphQL API, interact with our ML models, and run in a containerized cloud environment.  Primary Responsibilities: Design and develop the scalable, resilient, highly performant services that power our products. Collaborate with a cross-functional team to deliver new features and products. Build with quality in mind. Your services will be secure, observable, maintainable, and fast. Add tests to our CICD pipeline to ensure your services will continue to work as we expand our product suite. Be a good teammate.  Minimum Qualifications Strong programming skills. Fluent in Python, and experience with another language such as Go, C#, C++, Kotlin, or Java. System design and architecture. Have experience designing and building scalable APIs. Experience with the tools of the trade. Cloud services, source control, testing frameworks, databases, continuous deployment. 4+ years of industry experience in a software engineering role Self-starter, comfortable with ambiguity, experience initiating and driving projects with minimal oversight and guidance Why Should You Work With Us MDpanel was founded as a remote-work company. Our team works around the country and fully supports a positive remote-work culture. We are building a world-class engineering team. Your coworkers come from companies like Google, Microsoft, and successful VC backed startups. You will have a large impact in a growing field. There are big problems to be solved that will move the needle for the entire company. We've got the basics covered - competitive compensation, benefits, 401k, bonuses. The applicable salary range for this position is $158,000 - $208,000 depending on a variety of factors such as relevant experience.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend (US-Remote)
output_json.summary: Build APIs and services powering MDpanel's products, collaborate with a cross-functional team, and deliver high-quality, scalable solutions.
job_responsibilities: Design and develop scalable, resilient, and high-performance services
Collaborate with a cross-functional team to deliver new features and products
Ensure services are secure, observable, maintainable, and fast
Add tests to the CICD pipeline
output_json.company_information: MDpanel is a remote-work company with a team working around the country. It supports a positive remote-work culture and is building a world-class engineering team.

other.content: Strong programming skills. Fluent in Python, and experience with another language such as Go, C#, C++, Kotlin, or Java. System design and architecture. Have experience designing and building scalable APIs. Experience with the tools of the trade. Cloud services, source control, testing frameworks, databases, continuous deployment.
